channel.title: plastic on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in plastic on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: 'Garbage out, garbage out' by C.K. Meena
item.description: C.K. Meena is a columnist in The Hindu, one of India´s biggest news papers. She was my teacher when I took up a certificate course in Journalism and we soon became friends.

item.title: Sparkling water
item.description: Water used to be free. In some parts of the world it still is but with all the pollution and diseases, it is becoming increasingly difficult to safely drink straight from a river, and in many parts of the world, from the tap.

item.title: City
item.description: Written in December 2006 . There is no wholesome plant here There is no learning No passion. Being with the dead kills me. . There aren’t enough trees
